name: Dynasty Warriors: Strikeforce
description:
Team up with up to four friends for a heroic, action packed adventure.

For the first time, up to four friends can join together to form a Strikeforce, working as a team, to conquer massive armed fortresses and colossal beasts.

While immense castles, towers and ships serve as the settings for these legendary quests, the lighting fast action will go where it has never gone before - the skies above.

Gifted with new supernatural abilities, characters can streak across the skies and battle enemies at high altitude.

    Fight mighty bosses and breach heavily armed fortifications
    Customise your favourite Dynasty Warriors character with unique items and weapon selections
    Team up with up to three others for intense co-operative battling
